-- Nested json query
SELECT TOP 10
     JSON_VALUE ([jsonContent], '$[0].id') AS [id]
    ,JSON_VALUE ([jsonContent], '$[0].username') AS [username]
    ,JSON_VALUE ([jsonContent], '$[0].email') AS [email]
    ,[address].[city]
    ,[address].[zipcode]   
    
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://traininglabdp203.dfs.core.windows.net/testing1242files/jsonFiles/users.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    )
    WITH (
        [jsonContent] varchar(MAX)
        ) as [result]
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON    
    (JSON_QUERY([jsonContent], '$[0].address'))
    WITH (
        [city] varchar(MAX) '$.city',
        [zipcode] varchar(MAX) '$.zipcode'        
    ) as [address]
